text: Carom may refer to: * Ajwain (Trachyspermum ammi), an herb in Indian cuisine * Carom billiards (also known as Carambole) * Ricochet, a rebound, bounce or skip off a surface, particularly in the case of a projectile * Carrom, a family of South Asian tabletop games == See also == * Caromb, a commune in Vaucluse, France
title: Carom
